reviews.review_msg: Michael is great guy and tries his best, my advise is read the book where the exams questions come and get his bonus point because they have a huge impact on the grade. The only negative thing  about him is that should spend more time for lecturing than repeating last week material.

This is what every university prof should be like. Understanding, approachable, and keeps content interesting. So much of the course has real-life applications and it was a joy to take this class with Dr. Pollock.

AWESOME PROF! Very clear, easy marker, amazing guy. He is very approachable and will clarify anything you don't understand. Gives bonus marks with pop up quizzes, each bonus mark is .05% of your final grade, so it makes it worth it to study for the lecture! TAKE THIS COURSE WITH MICHAEL! He's amazing.

Amazing prof. Great course content. He keeps things interesting for a 3 hour lecture and sometimes lets us off early too! He's reasonable and always has interesting things to talk about in this lecture. Highly recommend!
He is extremely helpful! Midterms are easy, just need to study notes. Makes a 3 hr lecture interesting! Definitely one of the best prof ever!

Awesome prof. I had him for Psych 101 at UFV and it's an easy A if you just study for the midterm and do the project. The project is pretty easy and he doesn't make you present it. The midterm is on the power points shown in  class and the textbook. If you miss a day it's okay because he has all the power points online as well. Recommend him!
Very nice prof! He is clear about what he wants from students and tries his best to make the lecture as interesting as possible! If you're taking PSYC102, take it with him.

this guy is the best lecturer I've had at SFU. the class was 3 hours long, but he managed to keep the class interested.  the class was also super cool, im a science student and took it out of interest, I would def recommend it
Best prof ever! Very nice guy, helpful when you have questions. Very clear on what he wants so the project was a breeze. Exams pretty easy if you just attend his lecture =)
